cont.entity_a: Gateway to gateway VPNs drop regularly. Easy setup and VPN setup. Simple to install and configure NAT and VPN.
The router locks up often, requiring a reboot. The router works great and is easy to set up. The router randomly closes ports despite firewall rules.
Dual WAN option works sometimes; load balancing depends on stable ISPs. Dual WAN function is very helpful to connect redundant ISPs.
DHCP sometimes hangs and needs restarts.
Good for smaller installations with a nice web interface and easy configuration.
cont.entity_b: Installation process is difficult and requires technical support. Difficult to install and setup requires technical expertise.

cont.entity_a: Port forwarding limitation: can't redirect incoming connection from port 'X' to port 'Y'.
Load balance problem: can't use with incoming traffic like FTP. Load balancing doesn't work with most secure connections like iTunes downloads.

cont.entity_b: Difficult setup process and outdated software.

cont.entity_a: Product is outdated and does not support VOIP systems well.
cont.entity_b: The product information is outdated, supporting only up to Windows XP. The product does not work with Vista due to lack of drivers. The product is not compatible with modern operating systems.
Software is poorly designed but functional.
Sound quality is poor and cuts out frequently. Sound quality is good when it works, but wireless connection is unreliable. Good sound quality when using wired connection.
